Name: Bench Press
Description: Lie on a bench and push a weighted barbell or dumbbells away from your chest, targeting your chest, shoulders, and triceps.

Name: Squat
Description: Bend your knees and lower your hips as if sitting back into a chair, then return to standing. Works quads, glutes, hamstrings, and core.

Name: Deadlift
Description: Lift a loaded barbell from the floor to hip level while keeping your back straight, engaging your hamstrings, glutes, lower back, and core.

Name: Overhead Press
Description: Press a barbell or dumbbells from shoulder height to overhead, strengthening shoulders, triceps, and upper chest.

Name: Pull-Up
Description: Hang from a bar and pull your body upward until your chin passes the bar, targeting back, biceps, and shoulders.

Name: Barbell Row
Description: Bend forward at the hips with a barbell in hand and pull it toward your lower chest, working back, traps, and biceps.

Name: Lunge
Description: Step forward with one leg and lower your hips until both knees are bent at roughly 90 degrees, engaging quads, glutes, and hamstrings.

Name: Dumbbell Fly
Description: Lie on a bench holding dumbbells above your chest, then lower them out to your sides and back up, stretching and contracting the chest muscles.

Name: Plank
Description: Hold your body in a straight line on your elbows and toes, engaging the core, shoulders, and glutes.

Name: Bicep Curl
Description: Lift a dumbbell or barbell by bending your elbow, isolating and strengthening the bicep muscles.

Name: Tricep Dips
Description: Lower and raise your body using your arms on parallel bars or a bench, targeting triceps and chest.

Name: Leg Press
Description: Push a weighted platform away with your legs while seated, focusing on quads, glutes, and hamstrings.

Name: Lat Pulldown
Description: Pull a bar down toward your chest on a cable machine, engaging your lats, biceps, and rear shoulders.

Name: Chest Dip
Description: Lean slightly forward on parallel bars and lower your body, working chest, shoulders, and triceps.

Name: Russian Twist
Description: Sit on the floor with knees bent and twist your torso side to side while holding a weight, targeting obliques and core.

Name: Hip Thrust
Description: Place your upper back on a bench and thrust your hips upward with a barbell on your hips, emphasizing glutes and hamstrings.

Name: Arnold Press
Description: Rotate dumbbells from palms facing you to overhead press, combining shoulder and tricep activation with rotation.

Name: Leg Curl
Description: Curl your legs toward your glutes on a machine, isolating the hamstrings.

Name: Incline Bench Press
Description: Lie on an inclined bench and press a barbell or dumbbells upward, emphasizing upper chest and shoulders.

Name: Mountain Climbers
Description: From a push-up position, alternate driving knees toward your chest quickly, engaging core, shoulders, and cardio endurance.

Name: Chest Press Machine
Description: Push the handles of the chest press machine away from your body, focusing on chest, shoulders, and triceps.

Name: Seated Row
Description: Sit at a cable row machine and pull the handle toward your torso, engaging back muscles and biceps.

Name: Leg Extension
Description: Extend your legs against a padded lever on a machine to isolate and strengthen the quadriceps.

Name: Calf Raise
Description: Raise your heels off the ground while standing or on a step, targeting the calf muscles.

Name: Face Pull
Description: Pull a cable toward your face with elbows high, working rear delts, traps, and upper back.

Name: Cable Lateral Raise
Description: Lift a cable outward to shoulder height, isolating the lateral deltoids.

Name: Hammer Curl
Description: Curl dumbbells with palms facing each other, working biceps and forearms.

Name: Dumbbell Step-Up
Description: Step onto a bench or platform while holding dumbbells, working quads, glutes, and balance.

Name: Glute Kickback
Description: Kick your leg back while on all fours or using a cable machine, isolating the glutes.

Name: Side Plank
Description: Support your body on one elbow and the side of one foot, engaging obliques and core.

Name: Reverse Fly
Description: With dumbbells or cables, lift your arms to the side while bent over, targeting rear shoulders and upper back.

Name: Incline Dumbbell Curl
Description: Curl dumbbells while lying on an incline bench to stretch and target biceps more intensely.

Name: Skull Crusher
Description: Lie on a bench and lower a barbell or dumbbells toward your forehead, targeting the triceps.

Name: Good Morning
Description: With a barbell on your shoulders, hinge at the hips while keeping a straight back, engaging hamstrings and lower back.

Name: Farmer's Walk
Description: Hold heavy weights in each hand and walk a distance, building grip strength, core, and overall conditioning.

Name: Cable Crunch
Description: Pull a cable downward while crunching your torso, focusing on the abdominal muscles.

Name: Front Squat
Description: Hold a barbell across the front of your shoulders and perform a squat, emphasizing quads and core.

Name: Single-Leg Deadlift
Description: Balance on one leg while lifting a weight, hinging at the hips to work hamstrings, glutes, and stability.

Name: Dumbbell Shrug
Description: Lift your shoulders toward your ears while holding dumbbells, targeting traps.

Name: Burpees
Description: From standing, drop into a push-up position, perform a push-up, jump back to standing, and jump up, combining strength and cardio.

Name: Pistol Squat
Description: Perform a squat on one leg while keeping the other leg extended in front of you, improving balance, strength, and mobility.

Name: Chest-Supported Row
Description: Lie face down on an incline bench and pull dumbbells or a barbell toward your torso, isolating the upper back muscles.

Name: Cable Kickback
Description: Attach a cable to your ankle and extend your leg backward to work the glutes and hamstrings.

Name: Hanging Leg Raise
Description: Hang from a bar and lift your legs straight up to engage the lower abs and hip flexors.

Name: Medicine Ball Slam
Description: Lift a medicine ball overhead and slam it to the ground with force, working the core, shoulders, and cardio.

Name: Reverse Lunge with Twist
Description: Step backward into a lunge and twist your torso toward the front leg, targeting legs, glutes, and obliques.

Name: Turkish Get-Up
Description: Move from lying on the floor to standing while holding a weight overhead, improving full-body strength and stability.

Name: Cable Woodchopper
Description: Pull a cable diagonally across your body from high to low, working obliques and core rotational strength.

Name: Zercher Squat
Description: Hold a barbell in the crook of your elbows and perform a squat, emphasizing quads, core, and upper back.

Name: Box Jump
Description: Jump onto a sturdy platform or box, improving explosive leg power and coordination.

Name: Weighted Pull-Up
Description: Perform a pull-up while wearing a weight belt or holding a dumbbell between your legs to increase back and bicep strength.

Name: Step Mill Climb
Description: Use a step mill machine to climb continuously, improving leg endurance and cardiovascular fitness.

Name: Overhead Tricep Extension
Description: Raise a dumbbell or cable overhead and lower it behind your head, extending the arms to isolate the triceps.

Name: Windmill
Description: Hold a weight overhead and bend at the hips to touch the opposite foot, working shoulders, obliques, and hamstrings.

Name: Side Lunge
Description: Step to the side and bend the leading knee while keeping the other leg straight, targeting quads, glutes, and inner thighs.

Name: Battle Ropes
Description: Move heavy ropes in waves or slams, engaging arms, shoulders, core, and improving cardio.

Name: Sled Push
Description: Push a weighted sled across a surface, building leg strength, power, and conditioning.

Name: Bear Crawl
Description: Move forward on hands and feet while keeping your hips low, engaging shoulders, core, and legs.

Name: Kettlebell Swing
Description: Swing a kettlebell between your legs and up to shoulder height, targeting glutes, hamstrings, hips, and core.

Name: Skater Jump
Description: Jump laterally from one leg to the other in a skating motion, improving leg power, balance, and agility.
